ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) packet Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, rinsed, drained and chopped
assorted, fresh vegetable sticks cut up for dipping

cookingTips: Drain spinach thoroughly to prevent watery dip
Make ahead and refrigerate for flavors to meld
Serve in hollowed bread loaf for impressive presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you looking for make-ahead party appetizers, and would you like serving suggestions?
